name: Road Rage (itch) (AsafSharaby)
description:
Road Rage is a  endless arcade racing. for MOBILE. 

Summary:

Speed-lover, The challenging car racing game brings you the real life experience!

Have fun driving your car through highway traffic and overtaking various road cars while you speed up to the limit! Earn more cash and buy more cars, and upgrade your cars to the top most! 

Good luck on the highway at Road Rage !

GAMEPLAY 

  • Touch gas button to accelerate.
  •  Touch brake button to slow down.
  •  Touch left/right button to steer .
